scenes.prompt: Wide shot of a sun-drenched coral reef. Pip, a pale yellow, anxious seahorse with large eyes, hides behind fan coral. Sunlight streams through the water. An ancient sea turtle with a barnacle-covered shell looks at Pip kindly. Turtle nods towards a dark cave entrance. Shallow depth of field, dappled light, timid atmosphere.

Tracking shot following Pip (pale yellow seahorse, large eyes) and the sea turtle as they enter a dark cave. Bioluminescent plankton glows green and blue on the cavern walls. The atmosphere is mysterious and slightly ominous. Soft, eerie music plays. Pip looks hesitant but curious. Widescreen, low-key lighting, dramatic atmosphere.

Medium shot inside a breathtaking grotto. Giant, shimmering pearls lie scattered on the sandy floor, pulsating with light. Pip (pale yellow seahorse) stares in awe. A distraught clownfish (orange/white stripes dulled) searches frantically. Pip holds a shimmering emerald pearl. Swelling, magical music. High key lighting, vibrant colors, wonder.

Close-up of Pip (pale yellow seahorse, large eyes) smiling radiantly. A group of tiny clownfish reunites with their parent in a swirl of bubbles. Other sea creatures gather, smiling. Triumphant music plays. Pip's eyes sparkle with newfound confidence. Warm lighting, vibrant colors, joyful atmosphere. Heroic feel.
